name: finbro-browser
description: Custom Chromium-based browser with intelligent autofill capabilities
author: Finbro

scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy-assets && npm run fix-renderer
scripts.copy-assets: cp src/renderer/index.html dist/renderer/index.html && cp src/renderer/styles.css dist/renderer/styles.css
scripts.fix-renderer: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const file='dist/renderer/index.js'; let code=fs.readFileSync(file,'utf8'); code=code.replace('Object.defineProperty(exports, \"__esModule\", { value: true });',''); code=code.replace('exports = {};',''); fs.writeFileSync(file,code);"
